author: Special Correspondent
text:
Some areas in the city may not get adequate water supply on Wednesday as maintenance works will be undertaken at the desalination plant in Minjur.

Areas such as Madhavaram, Manali, Thiruvottiyur, Ernavoor, Kathivakkam, Patel Nagar and Vyasarpadi might not get enough drinking water between 7 a.m. and 11 p.m.
title: Water supply to be affected in some areas today
